name: Museum Curator - MVP / Demo
description: A full stack web application for curating and exploring museum artwork collections. This project was built as a freelance MVP / demo for a client.

name: Dating App (Inactive)
description: Built via a tutorial to practice and experiment with a .NET backend and Angular frontend integration.

name: Tier List Creator (Inactive)
description: An inactive full stack web application designed to let users create custom tier lists. Originally built to explore Go as a backend. While development is currently paused, it showcases a functional backend.

name: Northcoders Backend - NC News
description: This project is an API built to be a backend service for accessing application data programmatically, which will allow information to be provided to the frontend architecture.

name: Northcoders Frontend - NC News
description: This project is a dynamic frontend designed to provide users with an engaging and intuitive interface for the NC News - Backend API. With functionality of the components being prioritised during development.

name: Portfolio Website
description: This project is a personal portfolio website designed to showcase my skills, experience, and projects in a clean and engaging way.
